text: Otello Capitani (17 March 1890 - 20 September 1912) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's artistic individual all-around event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. He was killed in action during the Italo-Turkish War. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1912 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Modena Category:Italian military personnel killed in action Category:People of the Italo-Turkish War
title: Otello Capitani
